Incorrect Reasoning.text: The summary concludes that physical exam was "normal" which is not clearly stated in the patient record.

Omitted Other Inconsistency.omittedDetails: it is mentioned specifically in the patient records the points that were tested in physical exam.

Omitted Medicinal Instructions.omittedDetails: Omitted Medications used to treat "hypertension on admission"
